mapper.select:
SELECT xt_operate_business_logs.xt_operate_b_logs_id, xt_operate_business_logs.xt_operate_b_logsTime, xt_operate_business_logs.xt_userinfo_id, xt_operate_business_logs.xt_operate_b_logsModules, xt_operate_business_logs.xt_operate_b_logsMethod, xt_operate_business_logs.xt_operate_b_logsMethodPar, xt_operate_business_logs.xt_operate_b_logsResult, xt_userinfo.xt_userinfo_realName FROM xt_operate_business_logs LEFT JOIN xt_userinfo xt_userinfo ON xt_operate_business_logs.xt_userinfo_id = xt_userinfo.xt_userinfo_id WHERE 1=1
AND xt_operate_business_logs.xt_operate_b_logsResult like '%${xt_operate_b_logsResult}%'
AND xt_operate_business_logs.xt_operate_b_logsMethodPar like '%${xt_operate_b_logsMethodPar}%'
AND xt_operate_business_logs.xt_operate_b_logsMethod like '%${xt_operate_b_logsMethod}%'
AND xt_operate_business_logs.xt_operate_b_logsModules like '%${xt_operate_b_logsModules}%'
ORDER BY xt_operate_business_logs.xt_operate_b_logsTime DESC

SELECT xt_operate_business_logs.xt_operate_b_logs_id, xt_operate_business_logs.xt_operate_b_logsTime, xt_operate_business_logs.xt_userinfo_id, xt_operate_business_logs.xt_operate_b_logsModules, xt_operate_business_logs.xt_operate_b_logsMethod, xt_operate_business_logs.xt_operate_b_logsMethodPar, xt_operate_business_logs.xt_operate_b_logsResult, xt_userinfo.xt_userinfo_realName FROM xt_operate_business_logs LEFT JOIN xt_userinfo xt_userinfo ON xt_operate_business_logs.xt_userinfo_id = xt_userinfo.xt_userinfo_id WHERE xt_operate_business_logs.xt_operate_b_logs_id=#{xt_operate_b_logs_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO xt_operate_business_logs ( xt_operate_b_logs_id, xt_operate_b_logsTime, xt_userinfo_id, xt_operate_b_logsModules, xt_operate_b_logsMethod, xt_operate_b_logsMethodPar, xt_operate_b_logsResult ) VALUES ( #{xt_operate_b_logs_id}, #{xt_operate_b_logsTime}, #{xt_userinfo_id}, #{xt_operate_b_logsModules}, #{xt_operate_b_logsMethod}, #{xt_operate_b_logsMethodPar}, #{xt_operate_b_logsResult} )
mapper.update: UPDATE xt_operate_business_logs SET xt_operate_b_logs_id = #{xt_operate_b_logs_id}, xt_operate_b_logsTime = #{xt_operate_b_logsTime}, xt_userinfo_id = #{xt_userinfo_id}, xt_operate_b_logsModules = #{xt_operate_b_logsModules}, xt_operate_b_logsMethod = #{xt_operate_b_logsMethod}, xt_operate_b_logsMethodPar = #{xt_operate_b_logsMethodPar}, xt_operate_b_logsResult = #{xt_operate_b_logsResult} WHERE xt_operate_b_logs_id=#{xt_operate_b_logs_id}
mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM xt_operate_business_logs WHERE xt_operate_b_logs_id IN
#{item}
